sen.j: 近衛尚嗣（このえ ひさつぐ、元和 (日本)8年3月10日 (旧暦)(1622年4月20日) - 承応2年7月19日 (旧暦)(1653年9月10日)）は、江戸時代前期の公家。
sen.e: Hisatsugu KONOE (April 20, 1622 - September 10, 1653) was a Court noble in the early Edo Period.
Hisatsugu KONOE (April 20, 1622 - September 10, 1653) was a Court noble in the early Edo Period.

Toshi choja (head of the Fujiwara clan).

Juichii Kanpaku (Junior First Rank, the chief adviser to the Emperor) as his official rank.

Daigen as his posthumous Buddhist name.

sen.j: 妹に泰姫君（水戸藩藩主徳川光圀室）がいる。
sen.e: Yasuhime no kimi (wife of Mitsukuni TOKUGAWA, the lord of the Mito Domain) was his younger sister.
Yasuhime no kimi (wife of Mitsukuni TOKUGAWA, the lord of the Mito Domain) was his younger sister.

sen.j: 正室は叔父、後水尾天皇の第三皇女、（女二宮）昭子内親王。
sen.e: His lawful wife was (Onnaninomiya (literally second daughter)) Imperial princess Akiko, the third princess of Emperor Gomizunoo.
sen.cmt: 後水尾天皇の娘については、2番目の娘が女一宮とよばれ、3番目の昭子が女二宮と呼ばれたそうです。
sen.e: His lawful wife was (Onnaninomiya (literally second daughter)) Imperial princess Akiko, the third princess of Emperor Gomizunoo.

sen.j: 寛永十年（1633年） - 権中納言
